TopicTitle: Gold Stingray Inc. Spacecraft Division [New: Cygnus, Azure Kite, Azure Orca]

I\'d like a small escort fighter that can go fast and will stall at 30 m/s.
Kk. Will try.

Sss, your request is done. (Mylioba Interceptor)

Hope you like it. :3

It doesn\'t stall at 30m/s though, rather glides for looooong distances. Capable of landing, too. I\'ve done it.

HEy may I join your company you guys make really good planes and so do I currently give them becuase I am not on computer ( I on a iPad) and I wont be. Back on computer for like 2 weeks but when I on I will give you a few of my desings

Just show me a few of your designs when you can.
we should use this technology to make our own nation it will be completely industry and will have extreme air domanice

RP\'s closed, can\'t.

When I get my computer back I will show u a design were 2 planes come off another just how do I control them :\'(

Plane control:

W: Down A: Left: S: Down D: Right (W and S are inverted) E. Rotate Right Q: Rotate Left

L-Shift: More thrust Ctrl: Less thrust T: SAS R: RCS
Ill take a request: its a heavy bomber that launches 12 jellycubes adv modular missiles has a top speed of 250 M/S and it stalls at 50 M/S (or less )
Lugi I meant how to control the 2 planes that come off it the game treats it like degree

I want the closest thing you can get to the FA-22 Raptor.

Must carry ATLEAST 5 missiles and be capable of Mach 2 flight.

Just added a few rules on requests, guise.

@Fox, what\'s Mach 2 in m/s?

@Shhhilent; will get on yours asap.

Mach 2 is just over 680 m/s.

I, personally, am looking for a large, stable plane that can handle low speeds well - reaching a high speed is not necessary. It should be able to hold some small parts on the underside of the fuselage or wings - use radial decouplers for this, they\'re almost exactly the same as the mod part I want to use.
